panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together

targets.expr: (((count(count(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="main", job="node-exporter"}) by (cpu))) - avg(sum by (mode)(irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode='idle',instance="main", job="node-exporter"}[5m])))) * 100) / count(count(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="main", job="node-exporter"}) by (cpu))

panels.title: CPU Busy

alert.message: A container is using more than 80% of CPU for more than 5 minutes
alert.name: CPU Usage per Container alert

alert.message: Space in FS / is lower than 500MB
alert.name: / FS alert

alert.message: Space in FS /home is lower than 1.5GB
alert.name: /home FS Alert

targets.expr: node_filesystem_size_bytes{instance="main", job="node-exporter", device!~'rootfs', mountpoint="/home"} - node_filesystem_avail_bytes{instance="main", job="node-exporter",  device!~'rootfs', mountpoint="/home"}

alert.message: Space in FS /datos is lower than 5GB
alert.name: /datos alert

targets.expr: node_filesystem_size_bytes{instance="main", job="node-exporter", device!~'rootfs', mountpoint="/datos"} - node_filesystem_avail_bytes{instance="main", job="node-exporter",  device!~'rootfs', mountpoint="/datos"}
